text: Nicolas Yonezuka is a former American competitor in the sport of judo. He was born in 1965, and is from New Jersey. Yonezuka attended Watchung Hills Regional High School, where he made the schools Hall of Fame. He was taught judo by his father, Yoshisada Yonezuka.Seiko Seito Goju-Ryu Karate-Do Kyokai History Nicolas was a 5 time US National Judo Champion, and qualified for the 1980 U.S. Olympic team but did not compete due to the U.S. Olympic Committee's boycott of the 1980 Summer Olympics in Moscow, Russia at the age of 16. He was one of 461 athletes to receive a Congressional Gold Medal many years later.US Olympic Judo Teams 1964 to present Retrieved 2018-08-19. ==References== Category:American male judoka Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Congressional Gold Medal recipients
title: Nicolas Yonezuka
